channel.name: Proposal - Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb

messages.text:
Hi Sophia,Thanks again for your time last week. I’ve attached the formal proposal forthe Sales Suite Upgrade. It includes the AI enhancement bundle and reflects
the 8% discount we discussed.Let me know if you’d like to go over any specifics.Best,Bruce

Hi Bruce,Appreciate the quick turnaround. This looks aligned overall — I’ll forward
it to our RevOps lead and circle back with any questions.Regards,Sophia

Hi Sophia,Just wanted to check if your team had a chance to review the proposal.
We’re flexible on start dates if that helps align internally.Cheers,Bruce

Hey Bruce,Just got some initial feedback. They’re mostly aligned — only question was
whether implementation support is included in the first month.– Sophia

Yes — full onboarding and implementation support are included for the first
30 days at no extra cost. I’ll highlight that in a revised version.Also happy to get on Slack if that’s easier for your side.Best,Bruce

That helps a lot, thank you. Feel free to send the updated doc. And yes —
let\'s move this to Slack, it’s faster for us at this point. I’ve sent you a
dm on slack.Thanks,Sophia
messages.intent: confirm, request document, propose communication channel change

messages.text:
Got the invite — thank you. Uploading the revised version now. Looking
forward to wrapping this up smoothly.Talk soon,Bruce

summary: The sales rep, Bruce Wayne, sent a proposal to Sophia Nguyen, who subsequently forwarded it for internal review. Sophia raised a question regarding implementation support, which Bruce promptly clarified and committed to revising the document. They have now agreed to transition further communication to Slack, indicating positive progress towards closing.
